verses.roman: "urukrame eva bhaktim eva ahaitukīm eva kurvanty eva"

synonyms: urukrame—unto the most powerful; eva—only; bhaktim—devotional service; eva—only; ahaitukīm—without motives; eva—only; kurvanti—they perform; eva—only.
translation: "The words urukrama, bhakti, ahaitukī and kurvanti are added to the word eva again and again. Thus another meaning is explained.
